extracted_data_phrases: with the divine nature and eternal truths

disobedience.question: Did I reject the unity of Christ's body, the Church, when frustrated with others in it?

disobedience.question: Did you mock the Church?
disobedience.description: Mocking the church shows contempt for Christ's established institution on earth, disrespects the Body of Christ, and undermines the Church's divine authority as guided by the Holy Spirit.

incontinence.question: Did you lack self-control and speak to others using language that is coarse or unbecoming?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

incontinence.question: Did you lack self-control and speak to others with vulgarity, using words that were unbecoming of your Christian dignity?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable , particularly during social gatherings , family meals , or
particularly during social gatherings , family meals , or
gluttony.question: Have I overindulged in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, particularly during social gatherings, family meals, or while engaging in my favorite hobbies?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what is reasonable
gluttony.question: Have you overindulged in eating or drinking beyond what is reasonable, thereby demonstrating an excessive attachment to worldly pleasures that rejects the call to temperance?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what is reasonable
gluttony.question: Did you indulge in eating or drinking beyond what is reasonable, thereby demonstrating an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejecting the call to temperance?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

prodigality.question: Have I recklessly spent my financial resources on excessive gambling, jeopardizing my ability to meet my family's needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

prodigality.question: Have I excessively risked financial resources entrusted to me for unnecessary pursuits, compromising my ability to provide for family needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: for my family 's needs through gambling
prodigality.question: Have I excessively risked resources meant for my family's needs through gambling, thereby demonstrating prodigality in my deeds?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in sharing others ' private conversations or affairs
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing others' private conversations or affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in sharing others ' private affairs through conversations
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing others' private affairs through conversations, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I shared others' private affairs with pleasure, even if what I said was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: on a Sunday when it could otherwise be avoided
impiety.question: Did you engage in work on a Sunday when it could otherwise be avoided?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).
